faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services

items.q: What areas of law does your firm specialize in?
items.a: Our firm specializes in corporate law, litigation, real estate, contracts, NGO support, and consultancy services. We have experts in each of these fields to provide comprehensive legal solutions.

items.q: How can I schedule a consultation?
items.a: You can schedule a consultation by filling out the contact form on this page, calling our office at +964 780 551 5535, or sending an email to info@mideastls.com. Our team will get back to you promptly to arrange a meeting.
Our fee structure varies depending on the type of legal service required. During your initial consultation, we will discuss the most appropriate fee structure for your specific needs.

items.q: Do you offer services in languages other than English?
items.a: Yes, our team is fluent in Arabic and English. We can provide legal services in both languages to ensure clear communication and understanding.
